name: Repair Undead, Mass
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game: Advanced Class Guide © 2014, Paizo Inc.
text: This spell functions as repair undead, except as noted above, and it cures 1d8 points of damage + 1 point per caster level (maximum +20) on each selected creature.
target_zh: 每等级一个不死生物，任意两者之间的距离不超过30尺
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则减半 (无害)
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同修复死灵（Repair Undead）一般，不过它能够对每个法术选择的生物进行治疗，恢复1d8 + 每施法者等级1点伤害（最高+20）。
